summary: This is an email forwarding a draft letter to Judge Nathan regarding discovery in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The email chain involves U.S. Attorney's Office personnel discussing legal strategy and communication with the court.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: The presiding judge in the Ghislaine Maxwell case, to whom a draft letter regarding discovery matters is being addressed.

events.title: Draft letter to Judge Nathan
events.description: U.S. Attorney's Office personnel forward a draft letter to Judge Nathan regarding discovery issues in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated September 28, 2020, forwarding a draft letter to Judge Nathan.
The subject matter concerns discovery issues in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case.
The communication originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
